title: Laying it Bare Through the Lies
description: After a serious accident leaves Tenna James with amnesia, she can’t help but feel as if her parents are lying to her and she is missing something incredibly vital.When Dane Masterson runs into Tenna at a bar one night while out with his brother, he can’t believe his luck that fate has given him a second chance at love. But will he be able to win back her love if she can’t remember ever being with him? And when others are working to keep the two of them apart?
author: L.E. Martin
